front.title: The Trust Anchor Key Renewal Method Applied to DNS Security (TAKREM-DNSSEC)

abstract.t: This document provides an authentication scheme based on the generic SDDA-RR mechanism (SEP DNSKEY Direct Authenticator DNS Resource Record). The result is an automated key rollover mechanism for trust anchor keys. This represents additional security protocol elements to the DNS Security Extensions (DNSSEC) in the area of key management support functions for the DNS root zone and islands of trust.
